= Modifying graph orientation =

First step: produce an xml from code using [UsingDepend depend application]:
{{{depend.exe depend/trunk/src/* --output=graph.xml}}}

By default:

{{{depend_graph.exe --output=depend.png graph.xml}}}

http://lh4.ggpht.com/_zeWn5qPueCk/TH_GfKcMOVI/AAAAAAAADeM/uniju5AqweA/depend.png

With {{{--graph="rankdir=LR"}}} (see [http://www.graphviz.org/doc/info/attrs.html Graphviz documentation] for more informations):

{{{depend_graph.exe --output=depend.png --graph="rankdir=LR" graph.xml}}}

http://lh4.ggpht.com/_zeWn5qPueCk/TH_GfIswVeI/AAAAAAAADeQ/JyzkI9VgtUQ/depend2.png
